items.sentence: Why won\'t anybody answer any of my questions?
Would you mind if I went out with your sister?
Would you mind reading a bedtime story to Tom?
Yesterday, Tom met one of his former teachers.
Tom came in through a secret door in the wall.
Tom can afford to buy Mary anything she wants.
Tom can only remember one of his grandparents.
Tom can play the piano much better than I can.
There is an urgent need for good legal advice.
There is no door on this side of the building.
